pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This is a scenery shot of the Basilica di Santa Maria della Salute in Venice. The camera pulls back from a close-up of the basilica's dome and ornate facade. This movement reveals the grand steps leading up from the canal and two gondolas moored in the foreground.
